mapper.sql: t.id, t.key_result_name, t.key_result_code, t.objectives_id, t.status, t.is_valid, t.modify_time, t.create_time
mapper.select:
select
from tb_key_result t where is_valid = 1 and objectives_id=#{objectivesId} order by t.key_result_code

select
from tb_key_result t left join tb_week_report_rel tl on t.id = tl.key_result_id where tl.week_report_id=#{weekReportId}
select count(1) from tb_key_result where objectives_id=#{objectivesId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_key_result( id, key_result_name, key_result_code, objectives_id, status, create_time, modify_time ) values( #{id}, #{keyResultName}, #{keyResultCode}, #{objectivesId}, #{status}, now(), now() )

update.foreach: update tb_key_result set status = #{item.status} where id = #{item.id}

mapper.delete: update tb_key_result set is_valid = 0 where id=#{id}
